ai.summary: ACW Circular Walk 03A (short-cut for C03) is a challenging 16.2 km circular hike in the UK. The route combines varied terrain, sustained ascents, and several exposed sections that reward careful navigation and good fitness.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain with muddy and grassy sections, rocky steps, and uneven footing. Expect open moorland, brief technical sections, and wind exposure on ridges and higher ground.
ai.safety_notes: Plan for rapidly changing UK weather. Wear sturdy boots and dress in layers; carry a waterproof/windproof jacket. Bring a map and compass or GPS and know how to use them. Carry enough water and snacks for a long day and ensure you have a means of communication. Start early in poor visibility and stay on marked paths; be prepared to turn back if conditions deteriorate.
recommended_gear: Sturdy hiking boots with good ankle support
Map and compass or GPS device
Snacks and a portable energy source
Whistle and a charged phone (plus power bank)

seo.title: ACW Circular Walk 03A (Hard) – 16.2 km Circular Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore ACW Circular Walk 03A, a demanding 16.2 km circular hike in the UK. Terrain overview, safety tips, gear recommendations, and best seasons.
